SEARCH
Package com.example.sprite.Models

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.sprite.Models.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin, Entrant, Organizer
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the system. This is the base class for all user types (Entrant, Organizer, Admin). Contains common user information and properties.

All users in the system share common attributes such as:

  • User ID and authentication information
  • Contact information (name, email, phone)
  • Account metadata (creation date, last login)
  • Notification preferences
  • Event history
